website_summaries.verdict: With a solid filtering system in place, this gorgeous showerhead with filter cartridge  will help you get squeaky clean.
pros: Different settings allow you to customize your bathing experience
Simple, clean lines for a modern style
cons: Reviews are largely positive, but it does cost a little more than some other choices

customer_reviews.title: New models are much worse than the older ones...too bad!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a replacement for the Speakman Anystream 2000 like I was, you'll need to find another brand. I particularly liked the massage jets on the older model which produced straight forceful streams of water, but now the openings are smaller and the jets are designed differently such that they make a widely scattered (and annoying) spray of very fine drops around the less forceful massage streams. Both the older model and the new have flow restrictors, so it isn't just that. It's so bad I contacted Speakman to ask if there was something wrong with my particular new shower head. They're the ones who explained about the "upgraded" design that isn't nearly as enjoyable to use.
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: Great price, just a little too forceful
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself to be a fairly tough guy (I smoke meats in my back yard, I enjoy bourbon, and heck, I know how to change a shower head), but this unit is a little too “forte” even for me (we are on municipal water) out of the box. The five jets spray in a comical pattern, as a result they converge in the center to produce a much stronger stream than the outer edges, even when not in “massage” mode. I will likely give this one a little more time to try; it’s good for the price, but not the most luxurious (because that’s what manly men are after) shower head I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wagg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Budget Choice
customer_reviews.text: I was planning on purchasing a shower filter after reading about them and decided to upgrade my shower head in the process from an older but decent Waterpik. This budget Speakman shower head that is widely used in hotels across the world was an excellent choice. Its spray settings are nicely varied, the 2.5gpm rate works nicely with the Aqua Bliss SF100 filter I am using with it, and I have not done any modifications to the the shower head. Installation was very simple and the inclusion of the thread tape was a nice touch. When combined with the new shower filter, I am very happy with the shower upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: AMG77

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhhhhhhh!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This the BEST shower head I've ever used! I've been searching for a while for a showerhead that has great pressure without having to remove and rubber gaskets from the inside threaded ball...this is it! The pressure is so good it reaches to the back wall of my tub...great for helping me rinse after scrubbing/cleaning. I got mine for a great price buying used/like new...not a scratch and paid $15!!! Looking to get another for my 2nd bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Showerhead
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased the Speakman S-2005-HB showerhead to replace another brand/model that had proven to be a disappointment (failed in <2 years, clearly made of cheap materials). I'd noticed the Speakman brand in hotels during business travel, so we decided to give them a try. While not super fancy, this is a good showerhead. The water flow is good, and the different spray/stream options accommodate different personal preferences (from light spray to pulsing stream). It's easy to adjust the stream options, using the knob on the bottom of the shower head; and the head accommodates some swivel to allow you to direct the stream per your preference. We're very happy with the Speakman S-2005-HB.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina ShopperTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Speakman hotel version
customer_reviews.text: Spray is adequate with restrictor in place but others have removed : 1. With a drill will void warranty as I read. 2. Remove with forceps but cannot return to showerhead better if designed for easy removal but probably some regulation does not allow? 3. Either you like it or return it 4. Since adequate will keep 5. Settings are mist or forceful 6. Fuller spray than Moen x 15 years old 7. Good price point easy to install as designed 8. If you want more spray options a Aqua Elegante on Amazon easy to install too prior review 6 settings .
customer_reviews.author: JAD

customer_reviews.title: Identical to the one at the Hilton and Marriot hotels during our vacation.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item after experiencing it while on vacation at two different hotels, one a Hilton and one a Marriot. I requested the information from the property manager and was given the model number. It came in my choice of finishes and was super easy to install, less than 3 minutes. We now have the same fantastic shower that we enjoyed at those hotels. Price was excellent, as well! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: PBJFraley

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line shower head
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shower head even with the hard water I have. I bought these to replace the cheesy one's the builder had installed in my bathrooms that were clogging up. I expect these to clog eventually with calcium deposits but after two years they are still going strong. Nice spray pattern although I don't tend to vary it once I got it set to where I like it. Good spray pattern. I have medium water pressure and it still sprays nicely.
customer_reviews.author: G. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shower head.
customer_reviews.text: This was as easy as 1-2-3. Unpack, unscrew the old, screw on the new. I had no problems with any of these easy steps. The shower head as several spray choices and only takes an easy twist of the adjuster knob to go through the different sprays. The only reason I hesitated to purchase this particular head was because the word "Hotel" was in the name and I've been in a few of those that didn't have the best of shower heads. However, I took the chance and am glad I did. It was economical, easy to install, and gives a perfect spray.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bummer.  Plugs up with Calcium Within A Few Months
customer_reviews.text: At first I was satisfied with this shower head. It is used in many hotels. I initially provided a wide medium soft shower. But it does not have rubber nozzle tips, so it clogs internally with calcium buildup quickly. And without rubber tips it cannot be decalcified. So in sum it is a very poor product. I replaced it with one with rubber nozzles, and one that ships with the flow restrictor removed. Great! Forget this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews said a pain to install, but it took abotu 1 minute 45 seconds. It is the best shower head we've ever had. and all for below 30 dollars. Absolutely amazing. I wonder if the 120 dollar Speakman is even more heavenly....one day I hope to find out. Meanwhile, I've purchased one of this model for a Christmas gift and am going to deck out the other showers with this or another Speakman model.
customer_reviews.author: Will R. Volny

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRESSURE!
customer_reviews.text: I found it very hard to purchase a polished brass shower head. I first bought one at Home Depot and the pressure was horrible. I read the reviews on Amazon about the Speakman shower head and decided to purchase it. One of the best purchases I ever made. We did take out the pressure controller as stated in other reviews and the pressure is great! I will only purchase this shower head from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item over two years ago, and after removing the flow restrictor it worked nicely. Two months later it was necessary to remove the shower head and soak it in white vinegar & water to remove deposits left behind by the city water. Every couple of months the process is repeated, but no amount of soaking and scrubbing with a toothbrush has ever removed enough deposits to restore the original performance. After each shower the head is drained per the instructions, but it doesn't make any difference. Maybe city water just isn't what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: RDGuy

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of water
customer_reviews.text: This was great, and so easy to install. I bought two. One tiny note. I installed one with their tape, it leaked, I installed the other with my own thinner Teflon tape, no issues. So yes I went back and re-did the first one. So I did not like their tape. Those that say there was not a big difference are not dealing with the horrible shower heads that all the rest of us are pulling out that are builder grade shower heads. And the different sprays are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Londo

customer_reviews.title: Love this shower head - bought more
customer_reviews.text: We have serious issues with pressure in our 60yr old house. It's especially bad in the Master bath - which is an addition and farthest from the hw tank. We've had plumbers out to help us and he's added a bigger regulator on the main.. but nothing seemed to help. This is our 3rd shower head and it is like night-and-day. For our MB we took the flow restrictor out so now it feels like a normal shower. In our other bath we left it in and it works great as-is.
customer_reviews.author: D.DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Showers of Praise
customer_reviews.text: As the "lady of the house" it was with some trepidation I approached the job of replacing the shower head in our Master bathroom. Boy, was I in for a very pleasant surprise! Having downloaded replacement instructions from the internet, I really needn't have bothered. The instructions on the shower head box are perfectly straightforward, and Speakman even include a small spool of teflon tape to cover the thread on the shower pipe. I had the switchover, and a check for leaks and functionality, completed in just about fifteen minutes. Well done me, and thanks Speakman for an excellent, good-looking product that works well and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Better than before, but not high pressure
customer_reviews.text: Product is an improvement over my previous shower head, despite being plastic. Like other reviewers, the water limiter needs to be removed before it approaches being a decent shower head. Go on-line and find vids that use small picks and a screw to remove the limiter. Looks drastic, but its not - take the screen and gasket out, remove the tabbed cover, then put a screw into one of the limiters hole, pull and it's out. I replaced the screen, then reinstalled the head. Even so, it does not produce anything remotely like what I think of as high pressure.
customer_reviews.author: philip j devries

customer_reviews.title: Great quality showerhead
customer_reviews.text: As stated by a reviewer, remove the water regulator and you will have a waterfall of a shower. DONT REMOVE if you don’t like strong showers..
customer_reviews.author: yobochef

customer_reviews.title: I took out the screen with the o ring it pops out easily. under it is a water restrictor
customer_reviews.text: Wow This shower head kicks ass! Before I installed it I voided the warranty and removed the restrictor. I took out the screen with the o ring it pops out easily. under it is a water restrictor. I drilled it but it wants to spin but i finally made a hole in it than i used a small hook tool and ripped it out,, don't be gentle.popped the screen back in and installed it. Best shower I have ever had. like being sprayed with a lovely hot fire hose.word of caution for men,, If you set on massage, make sure it doesn't hit your bean bag. just saying.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking unit and provides outstanding pressure, even with the low water pressure system we have. It doesn't perform as well in the in-between setting...it's most effective with either full stream or full massage. The massage setting emits water only from the center holes. The unit is larger than it appears in the photo, measuring just over 4" diameter at the head and is just under 5" long.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pressure!
customer_reviews.text: While taking a road trip across the country, staying in many hotels, we came across one that had the best shower head either of us had ever experienced. Nice high pressure! So I immediately hopped on Amazon to see if I could find it and thankfully here it is! It arrived before we returned from vacation so that when we got home all we had to do was pop it on and enjoy a wonderful shower. We both HATE shower heads with no pressure...I need to be able to get the conditioner out of my hair without spending 10 minutes under a lo-flo shower head!
customer_reviews.author: AebKahle

customer_reviews.title: strongest I could find
customer_reviews.text: I love this showerhead. I went thru several that claimed to be high pressure and returned them. This one when on the pulse mode is the strongest, and feels the best. Its not stinging, its just good pressure and on the pulse setting its not just some jet stream, it mixes some spray in with the jets so you have have body coverage. I can simply put my lathered hair under that setting and it rinses all shampoo clean without even using my hands. And it feels good all over your body and I feel cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: rootleaf

customer_reviews.title: LIght weight, adjustable spray, but builds up scale
customer_reviews.text: This unit is lightweight plastic that looks like chromed metal, and that's fine and well done. The spray pattern is adjustable and the knob to do that works well. The main issue we found is that the unit builds up mineral scale which makes the spray pattern erratic. We've tried cleaning it by immersing it in vinegar, then tried a stronger commercial de-scaler from the hardware store, which didn't really help at all. The scale seems to clog the inside of the small spray nozzles which can't be reached with a brush or even a pin. Thinking that the only remedy is replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Do It Yourselfer - Acton MA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and durable shower head
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Speakman shower head which I installed in a guest bath room today. I have an identical one in my master bath that my wife and I have used on a daily basis for the past two years. No issues with the shower head after hundreds of uses. I first used this shower head in my hotel room at the Wyndham Hotel in New Orleans French Quarter. I figured if it is good enough for them it's good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Try The Mushrooms

customer_reviews.title: Good shower head
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would have been all metal so I was not happy when it came with mostly plastic. For the price, I expected more but the pressure was quite adequate. Just wish more manufacturers made things to last. We're living in a land of waste products rather than products that last. Let's start making products of metal rather than throw away items to reduce the adds to the dump/land fills!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST showerehead ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Speakman shower head. I travel for a living and would make note of shower heads I really liked. Every time I looked at the brand it was a Speakman. After showering under a Speakman your body feels invigorated, skin feels soft and an overall relaxing feeling. It's like getting a massage starting with your head all the way to your feet. This shower head has 7 several different spray options depending on your showering needs. It's easy to install and easy to adjust the different spray options. The polished silver is gorgeous and compliments my bathroom beautifully. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head! It really works. Our old shower head used to be so weak that it brought us no joy at all. We even called it "the crying shower" because the water literally was dripping down like tears. We are really impressed with the results after installing the new Speakman shower head. I can tell for sure that the shower experience I get at home now is better than most hotels out there. I also love its design. It looks great in a shower. Sometimes we come home all sandy after the day at the beach and there is no problem now washing it all off. Hopefully it will last a good amount of time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: This review is for the 2.0 GPM low-flow Speakman model
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful showerhead. We previously owned two 2.5 GPM Speakman models that were still going strong after ten years. To save on water, we recently retired those heads and bought the Speakman low-flow 2.0 GPM version. Saving a half gallon of water per minute by going from a 2.5 GPM to a 2.0 GPM showerhead is a big deal if you are paying for water by the gallon. I am happy to report that the 2.0 GPM Speakman showerhead makes for a very acceptable and pleasant shower!
customer_reviews.author: Thursday Trader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: I encountered this shower head when staying at a hotel in Tampa and knew immediately, I needed this for my home. I placed an order so that it would be waiting on my doorstep when I arrived home. Install was quick and easy. This is possibly the first shower head that I installed that does not leak at all. I have been enjoying great showers everyday since. I get out the shower feeling extra refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these shower heads, and they all work like a charm. There is a good variation in the spray, and the water pressure is good enough to rinse out my long hair when I'm washing it. I don't have to spend a ton of time standing there getting the soap out of my hair, which is really nice. Would recommend, it's a great value for the price point, and Speakman is always great quality! :)
customer_reviews.author: milohyellow

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head. I installed it in our bathroom with hardly any trouble. I used this tape  Dixon Valve TTB75 PTFE Industrial Sealant Tape after removing the old tape. I had to really use a lot a strength to get it so it wouldn't leak from the sides, but it hasn't leaked since and i have been using it for more than 6 months. The water pressure is fantastic and it really does make a huge difference compared to an old apartment one. I strongly recommend this shower head. Very easy to use water is fantastic and it looks great. I admit it is quite large but you get used to it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cheap shower head for better water pressure
customer_reviews.text: I installed this dynamo in my summer rental. The water pressure was horrible and I didn't want to invest a whole lot of money for just 2 months. This shower head was great - I took out the restrictor and the whole family was able to enjoy showers with great water pressure. would highly recommend this for anyone looking for a cheaper quick fix to bad water pressure!
customer_reviews.author: Hea597

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shower head.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this shower head. Truly hotel quality, it actually improved the pressure in my shower greatly, and matched my bathroom decor. It's a heavy unit, and feels like it is of good quality. The finish is great, and the spray pattern is really nice. The massage jet feature hits pretty hard for something in your home and not a spa. Feels great, a nice hot shower with the massage jet mode helps loosen the shoulders. We plan on buying this or a similar Speakman product again when we go to remodel our master bath. It's worth the money, just buy it already!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L.

customer_reviews.title: Speakman shower heads never never let you down.
customer_reviews.text: I guess some folks need the hand held shower spray, but I find it mostly just gets in the way. I love the clean lines of the Speakman shower heads, the way they never leak, and the ease of installation. They even supply the teflon thread tape! I bought two of these -- chrome for one bathroom and brushed for the other. Hate the way other manufacturers only have brushed nickel with its yellowish tinge. The gorgeous bell-shaped design and the overall efficiency makes me very happy.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: I never want to leave my shower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it's nearly the same as the ones some nicer hotels have. It has a nice strong flow output, easy to clean, looks nice, and is incredibly relaxing. It uses up more water for sure, but the feel is worth it after a long day.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan S.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Speakman shower head
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste our money on this shower head. After 4 months the shower head started dripping and the pressure diminished even after cleaning it. Not worth the money!!!!! I have an old Speakman shower head with 8 jets that is still working after 10-15 years of use that I will instead of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is great, and just what we were looking for in our main bath. We have well water, and we never had great pressure. However, this shower head really made a huge difference in the pressure. We were so happy with it's performance, that we ordered 2 additional heads for our other bathrooms. I would highly recommend it! I am so happy we ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: A while ago I replaced the shower heads in both ...
customer_reviews.text: A while ago I replaced the shower heads in both the master bath and my kids' bathroom. I installed this one in my shower and what I considered a nicer, handheld shower head in my kids' bathroom since I thought more people and guests would be using it. Now my kids all want to use my shower instead of their own. It takes my weak water pressure and makes it seem normal. I'm going to buy another Speakman for my kids' bathroom so I can have mine back.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shower Head For Those Who Desire Strong Water Pressure
customer_reviews.text: The Speakman S2005-HB is an excellent shower head. It provides strong water pressure. The water flow is nearly twice the rate as that of my previous shower head. Sure, it was more money, but not much more. It is very easy to adjust the type of stream, everything from very wide, giving the feeling of standing in a light rain shower, to very narrow, which is great for getting all the shampoo soap of of your hair.
customer_reviews.author: robert vergas

customer_reviews.title: Works great and has a powerful spray (tip on removing restrictor)
customer_reviews.text: On a closed course and under test conditions only with a professional driver, if you want to remove the restrictor (plastic piece with a little o-ring) the best tool I found to get it out was to use a wine corkscrew. The corkscrew tip is small enough to get through the small hole and curves behind it. Don't be timid. I tried a screwdriver and needle-nose pliers. The restrictor is mad to be tough to remove, so once you remove it, it is not going back. I did put the mesh filter back and it had a strong flow with the filter. Showers are wonderful again!
customer_reviews.author: schoboat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Speakman quality for such a low price!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this shower head! Nice strong, wide stream. Super easy to i stay. HIGHLY recommend following another reviewer’s hack for removing the plastic flow restrictor (easy, just follow the exact steps). Can’t believe how inexpensive it is - I’ve paid far more for lousy ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great showerhead!
customer_reviews.text: We moved into our new home and one of the first things we did was to swap out the shower head. After reading various reviews, I decided on this one. It arrived in the condition as described on the site. It came with nylon tape and easy instructions. I removed the other shower head, removed the "limiter" or "governor" which controls the amount of water that comes out and we are getting a LOT of good, solid pressure coming out. We love this unit! PROS: well made, easy to install CONS: None noted
customer_reviews.author: GeauxBucks!Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shower head if you live in a water use regulated state!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who lives in CA it is illegal to sell anything over a 1.8 GPM shower head. Most of the junk you can buy in the stores like home depot and lowes are 1.5 GPM or less.. turning a 5 minute shower into a 20 minute shower. Not only is this head a true 2.5 GPM but YOU CAN PULL OUT THE WATER REGULATOR WITH A PAIR OF NEEDLE NOSE PLIERS (which is permanently built in on other brands/models) to unleash it's full power! Now your showering experience is limited only by your water pressure. I'm probably getting a 3-4 GPM shower after modifying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a condo with all gold fixtures. This very basic, cool looking shower head and it works great!!! I I read all the comments about removing the flow restrictor but I chose to try it out first before messing with it. I'm glad I did because it works great right out of the box. Very easy install, I didn't even need the tape or a wrench, just screw it on and you're all set!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head - even while restricted
customer_reviews.text: We tried the 1.5 gpm, $8 shower head - and although, as a man, it was fine for myself but my wife wasn't impressed at all. She had trouble washing her hair and gave up trying to shave so we tried this. This shower head works perfectly for all the family needs. I also had a restricter on and had it limited to less than 1 gpm - my wife wasn't aware that I had set it that way and came out saying how great - nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just moved in to a newly built apartment complex and learned that there is EPA law that requires risked/lower water flow (1.5 gallon/2 minutes). I complained to management about how terrible attempting to shower was..."we can't do anything about water pressure", was the answer I received. I began reaching shower heads and decided to go with the Speakman S-2005-HB. My experience in one word is "AWESOME"!!! it was a quick and easy install; all of the flow options are great and the water flow/pressure couldn't be better.
customer_reviews.author: MMXX

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as promised
customer_reviews.text: For years, we have been dealing with low water pressure in our upstairs bathroom shower. We practically had to run around beneath the shower head to get wet. Based on the reviews, I purchased this Speakman shower head and my only regret is that I hadn't done it sooner. Not sure how it works, but the water flow coming out of our shower is significantly more intense than ever before. Do not even consider purchasing the professional installation option unless you absolutely cannot unscrew your old shower head without something breaking. The Speakman takes less than a minute to install ... it takes no more skill or effort than changing a light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG T WILT

customer_reviews.title: Best shower head you can buy...
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through a number of shower heads trying to find the right one. One that has a proper water slow, (looking for 2 gpm), yet does a great job distributing the water evenly and is low maintenance. This is it! Don't hesitate to purchase this. Seriously, one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ken H.

customer_reviews.title: Easily clogged.
customer_reviews.text: Clogged up within 2 months. None of our previous showerheads had this issue. I replaced them with this due to the great reviews. Now I'm looking to spend more money to go back to a more basic showerhead with rubber nozzles that don't get clogged up.
customer_reviews.author: GBR

customer_reviews.title: I read through the reviews and followed the directions for removing the flow restrictor (which was very easy) and now I can enjo
customer_reviews.text: I stayed at a hotel in Denver that had this showerhead. It provided such a refreshing shower that I emailed the hotel upon returning home to ask for the brand and the model. They replied that it was a Speakman showerhead and I found this model on Amazon. I read through the reviews and followed the directions for removing the flow restrictor (which was very easy) and now I can enjoy the same wonderful shower in my home. It was very easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: SugarCaneJane

customer_reviews.title: Love A Good Shower?
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at a resort and he remarked how much he liked the shower. I noted it was a Speakman; so when I go home I when on to Amazon and sure enough it has a large selection of Speakman shower heads. Well it has not disappointed. I can set the water at a lower setting and get a penetrating spray -- using less water is very important in California. I can easily change the spray pattern with a simple turn of the knob. Finally, it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Almost as great as at the hotel
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower head I have used. I ordered one when I experienced the Speakman at two different hotels on a recent vacation. The hotels' had more volume, I chalk this up to the volume of water available from a home shower, generally the supply is less at home than in a commercial establishment. I will be ordering a second for the guest shower soon. Very happy with the Speakman.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fortner

customer_reviews.title: powerful, cheap, looks classy
customer_reviews.text: I dont' know how the Speakmans double the price work, but this works fine. Its powerful and does feel like the hotel models. Changing the spray patterns is a little simplistic, you just turn the one knob and it gradually changes. Its not a selector. But that's pretty minor. It looks like nice shiny chrome, not cheap and plasticky. But if you are looking for powerful and at a good price, its a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: dko3tgk

customer_reviews.title: WOW, showering is fun again!
customer_reviews.text: What a great shower head! Full disclosure, we did remove the white restrictor disk but we were wowed by the power and strength of the water flowing out of this shower head. I feel like my showers are now actually shorter now that I don’t have to walk around waiting for our old shower head to produce enough water to rinse shampoo out of my hair. Very very pleased with this great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue P

customer_reviews.title: Second Head Did Not Last a Year.  If you have hard water avoid this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered second S-205 to replace first unit which failed after 18 mo. My logic was the first may have been an outliers...the worst purchase decision I have made on Amazon. The second unit was ordered Dec. 2018 and removed from service Sept. 2019. Again the spray head was clogged with calcium from out hard water. The offering from Speakman includes the following quote..."Self-clean plungers within the replacement shower head resist hard-water buildup and sediment keeping the shower head cleaner and easier to maintain." After two failures their claim is worthless. If you have hard water avoid this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawon

customer_reviews.title: Looks Excellent, Solid Build and Sprays Feel Great
customer_reviews.text: I got the 2.5 GPM and all 3 spray options are comfortable. One thing to be aware of, and this is my misunderstanding, is that the thread is deep and when attempting to thread it it appears too big, or it did to me. Just push it further in and the threads will all line up. Based on the look and feel of this modely assumption is that it'll look great and function without flaw for a very long time..
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Probably great if you don't have extremely hard water.
customer_reviews.text: We actually purchased 2 of these in separate orders. Out of the box we loved these. We tried them at home and liked the water volume, stream shape and look. These were purchased for our vacation rental condo in Mexico where the water is extremely hard, and fixtures tend to have lime buildup quickly. We chose these due to the claim of the "Self-cleaning" feature. Unfortunately, after only two weeks of use, the stream in both units now sprays in wildly random directions, and there is nothing that we can do to clean it...we have already purchased replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this shower
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shower. It feels like you have a lot of water coming down on you. The pressure is perfect and this is very easy to change the shower function. This only took me 10 minutes to install. 8 minutes was taking the other shower head off. The stream is wide enough so you are covered in water. I love spending time under this shower head it feels so good!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of the little plastic flow restrictor and BAM - instant high pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure and nice feel on the body. My wife loves the new Speakman shower head. I did remove the little plastic restrictor by drilling it out. There's nothing behind that plastic restrictor to be damaged, so drill away with first a 1/16th but and then work your way up. I had to use the drill method cause I didn't have a good fine needle noise plier, but rest assured, there's nothing behind that plastic disc but solid metal, so you can't mess anything up.
customer_reviews.author: iambowie

customer_reviews.title: Great water flow
customer_reviews.text: The large head puts out more than an ample amount of water. I removed the regulator for even more water spray. Also no more water spots thanks to the finish. Loved it so much I bought 2 more for my other 2 showers.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W.

customer_reviews.title: Things That Work Are Cool
customer_reviews.text: And this showerhead by Speakman, the Hotel Anystream just works. Not fancy but high quality instruction. Not unlimited stream choices but the ones available are effective. Great friend for the AM shower and the full setting is a nice upper back massage to get you going. Best we've ever had and appears to be built for years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B. Wedin

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL AND FUNCTIONAL
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the best shower heads I've ever installed and used. We have very low water pressure at our house, but you wouldn't know that when showering with this product. We bought a more expensive, heavy-duty one for my husband's shower because I knew it would be used every day, whereas I used to prefer baths to showers, so we put the "cheap" version in my bathroom, thinking it would only be used occasionally by guests. Well, I now like showers better than baths (mostly because the bathtub is not deep enough), so it's getting a lot of use. It's beautiful and stylish, too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing water pressure
customer_reviews.text: We live within our town limits so we have pretty good water pressure already. But this shower head is a game changer. We did not remove the piece that a lot of the reviews suggested and the pressure is 10 times greater than any other shower head we've tried. It's the best and just makes our mornings a lot better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Speakman makes a first-rate shower head--the S-2251 Signature Icon Anystream 2.5 GPM. It's pricey, but well worth it. Compared to that model, the Hotel Anystream is a cheap piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Patience

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure! I love this showerhead
customer_reviews.text: I used this showerhead while on vacation, years ago and my showers were so impressive I took pictures of the showerhead to find it online. Over the years I’ve purchased several showerheads from WalMart, Lowes, Home Depot that were much more expensive but didn’t provide powerful water pressure that this Speakman provides. I love it, I need to see if they a model that includes detachable arm with this pressure as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jdynamite

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: The Speakman shower head is everything it claims to be. Really strong water pressure, well-made and sturdy. It replaced a rain shower head that sounded like a good idea, but never really had good water pressure. This one is 100 times better. We're going to buy a second one for our guest bath.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a new shower!
customer_reviews.text: Speakman high flow shower heads are the best. This 2.5 gpm unit is a gem. We also replaced the spout because we were losing water pressure from water leaking out through an old diverter. Once that was done, this higher flow head blasts the user with various shower pulse options. A+
customer_reviews.author: HJS

customer_reviews.title: Best Showerhead By A Mile
customer_reviews.text: You haven't showered until you've done so with this Showerhead. It will leave you feeling as if you pressure washed yourself. Stock it works great. I don't know why people are removing the limiter.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: I can't think of a single negative aspect of this shower head. I hated the lack of pressure from my old shower head. Our plumber sold us one that practically showered off a layer of skin because the pressure was too much. This one is perfect. I ended up buying a second one for our other bathroom. I didn't do anything other than take it out of the box and screw it on.
customer_reviews.author: Kbuck6

customer_reviews.title: Loved it - would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this! Our water pressure was horrible with previous shower head - sprayed in an arc rather than straight line. The Speakman showerhead produces three bursts of strong water. Also the water heats up faster - or at least at a normal rate compared to previous showerhead - Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: It works!  Everyone in our household is happy!!
customer_reviews.text: SO MUCH BETTER THAN OUR MORE EXPENSIVE RAINSHOWER HEAD!!! After our bathroom remodel, our whole family was disappointed with the trendy rainshower head that cost 6x this one! We suffered for 4 months trying to adjust to the difference but could not. We read the reviews for high-pressure shower heads and went for the Speakman. It works! Nice control of pressure and multiple settings make everyone in our household happy. 😄👍❤️
customer_reviews.author: Wise Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shower head
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a home that had very low water pressure. Although this shower head is larger and more expensive than the standard ones, it is worth every penny. With its multiple pressure settings, it really made a big difference. I would recommend this shower head in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Wright

customer_reviews.title: Only gave adequate flow for 1 year, then the garbage can ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for 1 Year, then, lots of dribbles and inadequate Stream!! Removed and cleaned any deposits that could be blocking it, that did nothing. Ordered a very nice Moen shower head that's still working well, WITH NO ISSUES!! Not sure why Speakman gets such a high price for these, but it surely was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: L'wood

customer_reviews.title: Great, high pressure, high quality shower head
customer_reviews.text: I installed this shower head all by myself in under 20 minutes. The hardest part was getting the old shower head OFF ... but that obviously has nothing to do with this new one. The water pressure really seems to be much higher with this new shower head, and it makes showering go from something that is mundane and necessary to almost like a little luxury every day! There are three different settings, which are easy to flip through my turning the side dial. The "massage" setting has the highest pressure and is REALLY great. I'm considering buying another one of these for our guest restroom ... it really is a very nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Arguijo

customer_reviews.title: Pressure is Great
customer_reviews.text: We tried 3 different shower heads to fix the pressure in our master bathroom before we discovered this one. I took the advice from the comments and just removed the water restrictor before even trying it, so I don't know what the pressure was like before. But without it, it's perfect! Very happy with this shower head. If pressure is what you need, you've found what you need.
customer_reviews.author: SSkinner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I LOVE this product. We added it to our master bathroom and it's made our shower experience a little slice of Heaven. We did remove the flow restrictors; many thanks to others who've posted easy ways to remove it. I found the drill method to be the easiest to remove the restrictor. I like the large size of the showerhead and the fact that I can turn the nob on the side continuously without having to go backwards/forwards. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these shower heads I’ve purchased. I ordered the first a couple of years ago for our other home and there was such a drastic improvement in what was initially TERRIBLE water pressure that I had to get one for our new house too. I didn’t take the regulator/limiting thing out in our first one and it was still awesome. For the second I followed the instructions in other reviews to remove it because.... why not? I love this shower head and I’m sure I’ll continue to get one for any future homes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy install....2.5 gpm model has great water pressure\volume even in old homes!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shower head! We live in an old home, with low to medium water pressure. We bought the 2.5 gallon model and.....PRESTO.....we have great showers!!!! Yes, its plastic....but we didn't have the budget to spend over $100 on a metal shower head. This works GREAT! I love the easy select lever on the side versus the "twist the head and spray water everywhere" models that are all too common at big box stores. Great shipping and super elegant looking! I know its just a shower head....but this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Taisia Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, we have a bathroom still designed with gold tone fixtures. The shower head stopped working properly so I ordered this as a replacement. It looks great and works perfectly. Husband installed it quickly and we haven't had any problems with it. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rosenstein

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This device has seen me neked almost as much as my wife. It does not view me with love filled rose colored glasses and call me sexy. It is to blame for my increased water usage and higher gas bill. This shower head is so wonderful now I stay in the shower till the water turns cold because it's so relaxing. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Thebrenn

customer_reviews.title: One of the best low-flow shower heads
customer_reviews.text: I don't know whether any low-flow shower head would merit 5 stars, but this one is better than most, and it works well in a top-floor shower where a couple of other shower heads didn't do well due to low water pressure. I have one of these and one Delta 75152 H2OKinetic shower head. I like this one slightly better with its adjustment between a smooth and gentle flow or a more aggressive flow, but the choice between the two shower heads is more a matter of personal preference than of one being objectively better than the other. The shower head is big, but that doesn't make any difference to me.
customer_reviews.author: P. Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent adjustable showerhead with flow restrictor removed.  Very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent adjustable showerhead with flow restrictor removed. Very high quality. Looks great. Works great with easily adjusted spray patterns. Would recommend without reservation. Cannot comment on use with restrictor since I removed it before use.
customer_reviews.author: Dentish

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this shower head while staying at a Grand Hyatt hotel. This is an amazing shower head. There are so many options and the pressure is fantastic. What a difference from the one that was installed previously. I will never use another one.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected and nicely finished, the threaded collar is long enough to cover the shower arm threads for a clean looking installation.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shultz

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE WATER PRESSURE!
customer_reviews.text: You have to drill the water restrictor out of it which takes some skill (i asked a plumber friend to help me:) but it is most definitely worth it. I live in an apartment and although i don't know what the apartment complex set the water pressure at, i'm sure it's set on the lower end which sent me hunting for a shower head that would maximize what pressure i do have and this Speakman shower head exceeded all expectations. =)
customer_reviews.author: Jayne M.

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as "high pressure", It is anything but! ...
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as "high pressure", It is anything but! Water flow was noticeably weaker than from the inexpensive shower head it replaced. Cheap plastic - high priced - poorly made - rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replaced Remodeled Bathroom Showerhead Fixture ....
customer_reviews.text: I just remodeled my bathrooms in Southern California and spent a huge amount of money for new fixtures for both bathrooms. I had a lesser model Speakman before and regretted replacing it with the expensive showerhead(s) that came with the fixtures. Finally gave in, and bought this one and just used it for the first time. I cannot more highly recommend this for your shower....
customer_reviews.author: Chris Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good mid-range shower head
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these for a guest bathroom remodel in the shower. Works very well, easy to install and looks stylish in a commercial type of way. The restrictor can be easily removed. Creates a desirable pressure. Are there better shower heads for more money? 100% yes, but it works well if you have a small budget or need a quick replacement.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Great Showerhead
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good shower head for the price point. I am giving only 4 stars because when it is at the finest setting, it tickles my nose, have never had that happen with a showerhead anywhere, and I travel quite a bit, otherwise a terrific showerhead
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong Flow Continues
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I bought this for my home after using it in a Marriott hotel I frequently stay in and does not disappoint. I like a substantial stream of water for my shower (there are few things worse than a disappointing low flow shower) and this shower head is consistant at home as in the hotel. I did not remove the low flow screen as some others have, as it works fine out of the box and my kids might drain the reservoir. I would definitely recommend if you are looking for a nee head.
customer_reviews.author: T. Devine

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The main "drench" setting is fantastic and worth 5 stars. The "massage/pulse" isn't that amazing compared to a waterpik but I did not buy it for that, don't tend to use them. The regular chrome finish is very nice, we'll designed item, glad I chose this over the solid metal version.
customer_reviews.author: Joel B

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Craftsmanship?
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for each of our bathrooms on September 1st. By the beginning of December, the nozzles started failing by spraying in all directions, not a straight stream on either one. We had this kind in our old house with no problems. Not sure if craftsmanship has gone downhill or what. Used to love them.
customer_reviews.author: thefess

customer_reviews.title: Beware rust stains!
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty, reminds you of being in a fancy hotel, is easy to modify in order to get a high flow. I have had it about 6 months, using it for 1 shower a day. Now I find rust stains coming from the lower most nozzle, leaving another rust stain on floor of my shower stall. I guess they had to corners somehow- price too good to be true. Obviously there are cheap iron pieces internally- next time I will stick with brass. I fear the shower stall stain is permanent in the marble- cheap showerhead, expensive marble- BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Gary Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 settings, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have looked more closely at the description, but just in case you are wondering, this only has 2 modes: loose spray, and massaging pulse. However both modes are excellent. Additionally, the mode switch is really easy to use: unlike those shower heads that make you twist the edge of the shower head, this one has a knob that is very easy to turn. Update: revised rating DOWN due to very misleading product description: "Adjust the smooth-turn T-handle to switch effortlessly through full coverage and combination spray, gentle rain, and therapeutic, pulsating massage streams." This is simply not accurate. There are only 2 settings. And "in between" doesn't count.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Perry

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write reviews, but am completely impressed by how this has increase my shower pressure?! I live in a condo, and have suffered with pitiful showers for a year now......After seeing how many people purchased/reviewed this particular one, I thought I would give it a shot. I am thrilled at the outcome. It might be the best shower head I have ever owned! They send plenty of threading tape in the box, but I can't seem to get it tight enough to stop dribbling. A minor inconvenience that I'll figure out another day...
customer_reviews.author: Lori7

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This this screech/creeks when I use it. Only reason it has 2 stars is because d water pressure is decent. However, based on the review and price, expected much better. Meanwhile, the squeaking/creaking sound it makes when I'm having a shower is grating on my nerves. Will have to vote through d hassel of returning it and searching for a new shower head. Any suggestions pls.
customer_reviews.author: Vrykey

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Head!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a really fantastic shower head. It feels like a deluge but really isn't using that much water. It articulates nicely and has a massage function which I don't really use that much. Be sure to remove the water flow restrictor before you install. It's easy and makes this head far better.
customer_reviews.author: Brad M.

customer_reviews.title: Singing in the rain
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for ten weeks, so I can't address longevity, but it is a SUPER improvement over my older (10 years??) Moen stock showerhead. The spray is solid and heavy but not stinging. I can't tell the difference in spray from moving the lever until it goes to massage mode, but I really don't care bout that. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G

customer_reviews.title: American Perfection
customer_reviews.text: They should have 6 stars just for this product. I have never been more satisfied with any purchase as with this one. I just had the best shower in history. After I replaced my fancy european shower head with this American engineering ingenuity, it seems as if the stream burst out with a pressure I had never thought possible. Additionally, it has the advantage of being able to tilt sideways when you set the temperature. It is also incredible that this product is so inexpensive and actually quite attractive and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ben-horin

customer_reviews.title: I live in New York City on the 40th floor and my water pressure is terrible. I also have a bar to curl up ...
customer_reviews.text: I almost never take the time to write reviews but I HAD to on this one. I live in New York City on the 40th floor and my water pressure is terrible. I also have a bar to curl up for more height because I am 6'3" which makes it worse. SIMPLY PUT, THIS SHOWER HEAD IS THE BEST!! I have tried more expensive, more with bells and whistles, blah blah blah. If you want a nice looking shower head with a few settings and that most importantly turns low water pressure into a deluge, then this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: JLC

product_meta.title: Speakman, Polished Chrome S-2005-HB Hotel Anystream High Pressure Shower Head-2.5 GPM Adjustable Replacement Bathroom Showerhead
product_meta.description: Color:Polished Chrome| Size:2.5 GPMFeatured in luxury resorts around the globe, the Speakman Hotel S-2005-HB Shower Head is known for its legendary performance and unrivaled quality. Equipped with 50 full-coverage sprays and 8 center massage jets - this fixture is engineered to deliver a truly satisfying experience. By rotating the side handle in either direction, you can easily transition between Intense, Massage and Combination spray patterns. The Hotel Shower Head comes in a variety of corrosion-resistant finishes with a 2.5 GPM flow rate. Dimensions: Length: 4.13, Width: 4.38, Height: 5.9 Inches. Weight : 1.25 lbs
feature_bullets: CONTEMPORARY DESIGN: This premium high flow shower head has clean lines and a sleek, simple faucet design to enhance and complement any modern bathroom’s bath and shower accessories.
ANYSTREAM TECHNOLOGY: The adjustable shower head’s patented Anystream 360° system effortlessly transitions through Intense, Massage and Combination settings, evenly distributing water.
HIGH PRESSURE: Shower heads control the spread of water as it leaves the nozzle with patented plungers so that pressure can build and intensify, making it an ideal low water pressure shower head.
LOW MAINTENANCE: Self-clean plungers within the replacement showerhead resist hard-water buildup and sediment keeping the shower head cleaner and easier to maintain.
SPEAKMAN PLUMBING: From commercial plumbers’ supplies to bathroom accessories to fall in love with, Speakman delivers quality, innovation and performance with every product.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,084 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item ships only within the U.S. excluding certain locales such as CA.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
